1.content:
You have now entered the world of plagues. Now before you all get off and start writing...what sort of virus has infected the world?

Expanditis: A disease that causes the infected to rapidly gain weight and have an increase in appetite. Transmitted through saliva and bites.

Size Disorder A disease that alters the infected's size in some way. Size Disorder S causes the infected to shrink and Size Disorder G causes growth. Caution: those with G have more heightened emotions.

Gender Bender Virus: A disease that changes the gender of those who contract it. Gender Bender Virus B changes women into men, men are unaffected. Gender Bender Virus G changes men into women, women are unaffected.

Ageitis: A disease that directly effects the aging process. Those with the R strain slowly grow younger until they either hit childhood or baby age. P strain makes them grow older until they eventually die of old age.

Be sure you choose wisely because once you pick a virus, there is no adding any of the others.
1.title: Welcome to Plagues

choices: A scientist trying to cure the disease.
A normal citizen trying to avoid infection.
An infected citizen trying to infect others.
Someone who, for some reason, wants to be infected.
An emergency worker trying to help as many people as they can.
11.content: Ah, so we're going with the virus that causes expansion and weight gain. So, who are we going to be?
11.title: Expanditis(Weight Gain, Expansion)

choices: She attempts to interviews one of the patients
A patient ends up escaping and runs wild
She attempts another crack at a video diary
111.content:
Log Date: Entry 1

My name is Dr. Elizabeth Meta. I'm a doctor at the local general hospital. For the past few weeks, we've been receiving some rather strange patients with some sort of abnormal disease that...

"Hey!" a voice shouted as a young woman looked back. "We just got another batch in." the nurse said.

"Right. Be right there." she said hopping off her seat and shutting her laptop as she headed to the observation room.

Before her were a number of patients, all of them were much larger than how they originally were but somehow didn't seem to mind as they feasted on whatever food was brought to them and into their rooms as they were fitted into hospital gowns.

"They're just as large as the patients we've been getting." Elizabeth said. "Seems like there's no end to this disease."

"Yeah, especially since we've been getting them in all our sister branches too and I hear they're having a hard time too." the nurse said.

Elizabeth was a bit taken aback by these large people but also a part of her was fascinated.

Later that night when most of the staff had left...
111.title: A Skinny Among Fatties

choices: ...Jenny suddenly bit her, and didn't know why.
1111.content:
Elizabeth made her way to one of the rooms with the infected patients. Something about this new virus fascinated her, and she wanted to learn as much as she could about it.

Finally, she located one of the rooms and entered. Inside was a young woman, around 21 years of age. According to her medical report, she had previously weighed around 150 pounds. But after being infected by... whatever this disease was, she now weight little over 200. She had an obvious pot belly and thick thighs. She was munching on a hamburger.

"Excuse me, miss?" Elizabeth said. This got the woman's attention, and she turned to look at the doctor.

"Hmm? What do you want? I've already been tested." The woman said.

"I know." Elizabeth replied. "I just wanted to ask some questions. That's all."

The woman shrugged, and Elizabeth sat in the seat next to the womans bed. She took out a notebook and a piece of paper.
"So, what is your name, for the record?" Elizabeth asked.

"Jenny Matthews." Jenny replied, still eating the hamburger. Elizabeth wrote that down.

"Alright, miss Matthews. Tell me, when did you start noticing something was wrong?" Elizabeth asked.

"A few hours ago." Jenny replied. "I was just finishing up a jog when I saw my neighbor Lauren. We're about the same age, go to the same campus, so we're on good terms. Weird thing is, she looked fatter. A bit bigger then me now. I asked her what happened, and she turned right around and bit me!"

"Really?" Elizabeth asked, jotting that down.

"Yup, right on the arm! It was nuts!" Jenny replied. "I went home and bandaged it up, but that's when things got weird. I suddenly felt starving. I wolfed down everything in my house. No joke. And I was STILL hungry. Then I started getting bigger and... well, here I am."

"I see." Elizabeth said, writing that down. "So bites can transmit this."

Just as she was writing this down...
1111.title: Interviewed

choices: She needs to suppress and take an appetite suppressent.
She wants to eat and hits a breaks into a restaurant
She goes and raids the hospital cafeteria
11112.content:
Jenny for some odd reason went and bit Elizabeth right on her arm. "Ow!" she shouted as she dropped her pen and paper. "What the hell?" she said as Jenny let go.

"I'm...I'm so sorry..." Jenny said, astonished at what she just did. "But I just got so hungry and then looked at you and..."

"So what? You tried to eat me?" Elizabeth said holding her arm. "Hmm. Probably a reaction caused by the virus. Just try to keep that appetite of yours in check. I'll see about prescribing some appetite suppresants so this doesn't happen to anyone else."

"Are you going to be okay, doctor?" Jenny asked in worry.

"I'll be fine. I just need to disinfect and bandage the wound and keep it hidden from my coworkers." Elizabeth said leaving Jenny's room.

She was later back in her lab as she wrapped some bandages around her wound and hit it under her coat. "Though this may be a new problem. There's a chance her bite infected me. If so, I'll eventually get hunger pains like..." she said as her stomach roared. "Like that." she sighed.
11112.title: Unexpected Bite

choices: ...Chloe uncontrollably eating at the food bar.
111122.content:
Elizabeth could feel her stomach growling. She could try to ignore, but she had a feeling it wasn't going to be that simple. So, after punching out for the night, Elizabeth made a bee-line right for the nearest restaurant, an all-you-can-eat Chinese buffet she sometimes frequented.

She entered the buffet, and after paying, went to the food bar, grabbed a plate, and filled it up with whatever she thought looked good, mostly chicken and pork dishes. Returning to her seat, she began to dig into her meal.

Despite her hunger, she didn't just tear into her food. She tried to eat as quietly as possible. Even so, the meal tasted incredibly good. The place always had good food, but tonight it was just spectacular.

As she ate, she heard someone walk up to her. Looking, she saw one of the waitresses, a very pretty Chinese-American girl who looked only a little older then Jenny. She seemed worried.

"Excuse me, you work at the hospital, correct?" The waitress asked.

"That's correct." Elizabeth replied, swallowing a piece of pork.

"If it is not too much trouble, could I come in tomorrow? I got into a fight with my friend earlier, and she bit me. I cleaned the wound, but it feels so odd. And I've been feeling so hungry." The waitress explained.

Elizabeth stopped eating, and looked at the waitress. "Miss, what is your name?" She asked.

"Chloe. Chloe Wong." Chloe replied.

"Chloe, something has been going around lately, and it seems to be transmitted via bite. I would suggest checking yourself in as soon as you can." Elizabeth explained.

Chloe nodded, and returned to her work. Elizabeth resumed her meal, now worried about Chloe.

A little later, she was in the middle of a chicken dish when she was interrupted by a sound. Turning, she saw...
111122.title: Restaurant Run

choices: They break into a closed restaurant to avoid looks
1111223.content:
"CDC! Nobody move!" shouted a person in a hazmat suit as several others followed him.

"The Center for Disease Control?!" Elizabeth said to herself as she grabbed her plate and went under the table.

"What is going on here?" the manager said before one of them looked him over. "What the?"

"No bitemarks, sir." one of them said.

"Sir, we have reason to believe that someone in this restaurant has contracted a recently unknown disease. It is under federal law that we inspect all patrons and employees here." the leader said.

"Crap. If they find out I got bit, I'll be sent to the CDC HQ and be tested on." Elizabeth muttered as she ate her chicken before noticing Chloe huddled under a booth. "Psst." she said quietly as she motioned Chloe to come over to her then pointed to the rear exit. They slowly crawled over to the door before...

"Hey!" one of the agents said. They gulped before they saw them pin down a large man. "He's infected!" he said as they went on him as the two slipped out the back. After which...
1111223.title: Lockdown

11112232.content:
After a little while, Elizabeth and Chloe found their way into another restaurant, this time a more general buffet. It had closed down yesterday due to dwindling sales, thanks in part to the more popular Chinese buffet that the two had just left.

Once inside, Elizabeth and Chloe made their way into the main dining area. Surprisingly, it was still packed with food. Elizabeth guessed the owners never bothered to clean it out.

Chloe was practically saliviating at the sight of the food, and before Elizabeth could stop her, she bolted to the food bar and started eating whatever she could. Elizabeth wanted to stop her, but was halted by her own stomach growling loudly.

"I just ate, and I'm still hungry?" Elizabeth asked. "Well, Jenny said about the same thing, so I guess it's a symptom." She then went to the food bar herself, and started to eat as well.

In between bites, Elizabeth tried to get some info from Chloe about what happened to her.

"You said you got bit by your friend?" Elizabeth asked, while eating a chicken wing.

Chloe nodded as she stuffed her face with spaghetti. "She got mad at me for borrowing a book, and accidentally dropping it in a sink." She explained. "We yelled for a bit, then all of a sudden she grabbed my arm and took a bite out of it. It hurt like crazy. I bandaged it, then came to work. God, why am I so hungry?"

"It's a symptom." Elizabeth said as she swallowed a slice of pizza. "Of what, I don't know yet. But I guess it's serious enough that the CDC is getting involved."

Any further conversation ended, because the two just kept stuffing their faces. Eventually, they had cleaned out half of the food bar. As they sat, completely exhausted from their binge, they realized that...
11112232.title: Binge Time

choices: The CDC was standing there in the lab for questioning
Jenny was asleep right next to her desk
A nurse arrived with a bite in her leg
111122321.content:
"Oh...god." Chloe said noticing how fat her face looked in a mirror as her clothes felt tight on her, making her feel like she was in some sort of sausage casing. "How is this even possible?"

"Well, the human body normally determines the nutritional value of whatever we eat and converts it into things such as sugars and fats. But, and this is my hypothesis, the virus we've been infected with makes the human body consider all foods as fats. It even increases digestion so the fat can be added on quicker. It even appears the virus is also converting other nutrients in our bodies into fat." Elizabeth said poking her doughy midsection.

"But...this can be cured...right?" Chloe asked as she got up.

"Hard to say. There's still so much we don't know about this disease. Either way, keep that wound hidden. If the CDC find out, you'll be treated to very cruel medical experiments." Elizabeth said.

"Okay. I promise." Chloe said as they headed their separate ways.

Elizabeth returned to the hospital before morning came. When she awoke though...
111122321.title: Put on a little Weight

choices: ...a crying Chloe uncontrollably stuffing her face.
1111223212.content:
As Elizabeth awoke, she slowly became aware of the figure in the examination bed right next to her desk. Looking, she recognized Jenny, the woman who had bitten her. Confused, Elizabeth got up from her seat, and walked over to the sleeping figure.

As she did, she became aware of her midsection slightly jiggling. Frowing, she looked down. Last night's binge had taken it's toll on her. Her breasts and stomach were bigger now, not by much, but enough to be obvious in her clothes. She could also feel her thighs straining her pants legs and underwear.

She was distracted enough by her increased weight that she didn't notice Jenny wake up. Looking up, Elizabeth finally noticed Jenny. She seemed to have gained more weight since last night, mostly in her thighs and butt.

"Good morning, Jenny." Elizabeth said. "May I ask why you are in my lab?"

"First, I wanted to apologize for biting you." Jenny said. "I honestly cannot explain why I did that. My hunger just got worse and... and..."

"Jenny, you were not in control of your actions." Elizabeth said. "I believe this new disease is causing most of this."

"That's the other thing. I saw people enter the hospital last night. Said they worked for the CDC." Jenny said. "They were taking everyone who had been bitten. I freaked out and ran in here."

"I see." Elizabeth said. She was then interrupted by her stomach loudly growling again. "Really? Now?" She sighed, and took Jenny's hand. "Come on. You're probably getting hunger pangs too." Jenny nodded, and the two left the lab.

The hospital was almost completely empty. The only ones still in it were the people who could not be moved due to extreme illness or injury. Elizabeth and Jenny made their way to the hospital cafeteria. Inside, they were met by the sight of...
1111223212.title: Jenny's Apology

choices: something unexpected happens after their meal
11112232123.content:
"You gotta be kidding me." Elizabeth sighed as she saw Chloe at a nearby table scarfing down food like no tomorrow. She was even fatter than she was last night and was wearing a stretchy tracksuit instead of what she had last night.

"Oh...hi...Elizabeth." Chloe cried as she stuffed a donut in her mouth.

"Chloe, what are you doing here?" Elizabeth said.

"Well, you said to...I should come to the hospital as soon as possible and..." Chloe said. "I cleaned out my fridge and was still hungry."

"So you came running here. Chloe, you shouldn't be here. The CDC has been through here. If they come back, all three of us could face serious punishment." Elizabeth said. "Jenny especially since she ran and hid from them."

"I know I know but...I couldn't resist coming here." Chloe said.

"Ugh...fine. You can hide in my room for the time being. But if the CDC come back to check the place out for you, I'm not going to show favortism." Elizabeth said grabbing a bun from the tray and eating it.

"Deal." Chloe said as the three sat down and ate.
11112232123.title: Chubby Chloe

111122321232.content:
The next month was not the most fun for the group of 3. As it turns out, the virus, which was being called Expanditis, had spread throughout most of the city. Any infected citizens had been quickly rounded up and taken into quarantine, leaving the city nearly empty, save for a few random infected and non-infected.

With the CDC gone, the group ventured out into the city to find food, since their appetites simply could not be sated. Over the month, the three cleaned out various places. After a while, though, the group had gotten hold of a stash of appetite suppressant, which helped aliviate the hunger somewhat, but not by a whole lot. And that was how they spent their month.
----
Elizabeth slowly woke up, having fallen asleep on a supermarket floor. Getting was a challenge, due to now weighing nearly 450 pounds. Her face had puffed up greatly, and she had developed a second chin and the beginnings of a third. Her arms were as thick as cooked hams. Her breasts were the size of basketballs now, and her stomach was a beach ball sized sphere of blubber. Her hips flared out incredibly, her thighs were always touching, and her butt would need two chairs just to sit down.

After a few minutes, Elizabeth finally was standing. Slowly, she waddled out of the aisle she had fallen asleep in, and looked for her two friends.

She found Jenny in the seafood section, already awake. Jenny was only a little over 400 pounds now. She hadn't gained much in her face and chest, but her stomach was quite large, her hips had grown dramatically, and her butt was bigger then Elizabeth's.

"Morning." Elizabeth said, waving.

"Mornin'." Jenny replied. "Chloe's in the break room."

Elizabeth and Jenny went into the break room to collect Chloe. The poor girl got hit worst of all. Even with the appetite suppressant, she couldn't keep from eating. She had grown so fat that she needed a wheelchair simply to move, her own legs unable to support the weight of her...
111122321232.title: One Month Time Skip

choices: Chloe going from eating food to eating items like tables and wood.
A giant sized hole that was larger than Chloe had been.
Chloe convorcing on the floor as her body rippled
1111223212322.content:
She was without any exaggeration of the word...massive. A massive ball of fat as she just went and ate whatever she saw in front of her. She barely even acknowledged them now, all she knew was to eat and eat.

"Chloe? Chloe?" Jenny asked.

"I wouldn't bother. She's too far gone. She's just a slave to her appetite now. Likely what would happen to us if we didn't keep our appetites in check. I would suggest moving her but she's crushed her wheelchair. And we definitely can't lift someone her size." Elizabeth said.

"So...this is it for her and us huh?" Jenny said.

"Unfortunately. Lost to the disease like so many others." Elizabeth said as they headed out. "Just be glad we're not acting as slaves to ..." she said before they heard a crunching sound from the break room.

"What the heck was that? Did Chloe try to move or something?" Jenny said.

"Not sure. I do have one theory about that noise but...I pray that it is not what I think it is." Elizabeth said as the two ran back to the breakroom to find...
1111223212322.title: As fat as a Hippo

choices: ...the CDC arrived... and they DO want to help them.
...all three of them starting gaining, despite two of them not eating yet.
11112232123222.content:
In the back of the room, there was a massive hole, even bigger then Chloe was. It led into the storage area of the supermarket. Worried, Elizabeth and Jenny waddled into the storage area.

Cautiously, the two looked around, worried about Chloe. It didn't take them long to find her. Despite her immense weight, she had somehow knocked down a wall and dragged herself into the storage area, and was now gorging herself on as much food as she could reach, managing to shovel large amounts of food into her mouth in such a short time.

Elizabeth and Jenny waddled up to Chloe, and tried to pry a box of cereal out of her hands. They managed to do so, but Chloe just tried to reach for another. Desperate to stop her, Elizabeth did the only thing she could think of, and smacked Chloe's massive belly. The action made it wobble wildly, but it seemed to do the trick. Chloe stopped reaching for the cereal box, and looked at the two.

"Huh. Seems a hard enough physical blow will snap someone out of their eating frenzy." Elizabeth said. Just then, Chloe starting to sob.

"We... we've become freaks." Chloe said between sobs. "We can't stop eating, our metabolism is completely wonky, and we just keep getting fatter. Look at me, I'm so huge! When will this end?"

Elizabeth hugged Chloe's huge belly as best as she could. That seemed to calm down the immense woman a little bit.

"Shh, we'll get through this." Elizabeth said. "I'm sure they're working on a cure for us." Just as Elizabeth said that...
11112232123222.title: Cue the Waterworks

choices: A large horde of infected trying to get some food
A massive structure floating right above them
111122321232223.content:
Their bodies started to tingle as they suddenly began to grow fatter before each others eyes.

"What's happening?" Jenny said looking at her expanding waistline.

"The virus must be mutating. What we're experiencing is the effect of the mutation." Elizabeth said as their clothes strained against their growing bodies.

"So we're going to get fatter?!" Chloe said in disbelief as her already huge body was beginning to grow much larger as the three of them filled the storage room.

By the time the three of them had stopped growing, they were astonished by their new sizes. Both Elizabeth and Jenny had become a whopping 600 pounds as both were surprised as they saw Chloe now towering over them as a whopping 1,200 pounds of pure fat.

"I don't understand. The lab work didn't show any signs of mutation when we observed. It must only change when specific conditions were met." Elizabeth said. "This means creating a cure will not be as easy as we first thought. Especially considering we have no idea what the virus changed for us." she said before the supermarket started to shake. They looked and saw...
111122321232223.title: Mutation Gain

1111223212322231.content:
"Well, I guess they had to show up for us sometime." Elizabeth said as the CDC entered the supermarket, dressed in white hazmats suits.

Several CDC people surrounded the three of them. Of them, one stepped up to Elizabeth, and slowly removed their helmet. Under the helmet was a red-headed woman.

"Doctor Meta, please don't run any more." The woman said.

"I'm not exactly in any shape to run now, miss..." Elizabeth said.

"Doctor. Doctor Caline Parker. Center for Disease Control." Caline answered. "We're here to help."

"Are you going to subject us to experiments?" Jenny asked, worried.

"What? No! Where'd you hear that?" Caline asked, bewildered. "We want to help!"

"And the people you took already?" Elizabeth asked.

"Currently in quarantine, but unharmed." Caline answered. "Seriously, why do people always freak out when we show up? Someone call a crane and a flatbed truck. We need to get these 3 into a quarantine."
-------
A little while later, the group had been escorted to a quarantine zone, and put in cells. Elizabeth insisted on staying with Chloe, to keep the massive woman calm. Caline agreed, but took Jenny to a seperate cell.

As Caline walked away with Jenny, Elizabeth took the chance to look out into the other cells. Caline had been right, the other infected men and women had been unharmed.

"What are they going to do to us?" Chloe asked, trying to look at Elizabeth over her massive frame.

"I don't know." Elizabeth said. "Hopefully, cure us."

Just then, Caline returned to Elizabeth and Chloe's cell.
"OK, Doctor Meta." Caline said. "The CDC has been working tirelessly to find a cure for Expanditis, but we've been stonewalled by something. Everytime we think we're close, the disease mutates, and we're back to square one. We have one option, but it requires a specific DNA strand, and there's only one way to get it. So, Doctor Meta, I need..."
1111223212322231.title: Caught by the CDC

11112232123222311.content:
"What? Why her? You could just as well do with me." Elizabeth said.

"True but she's one of the bigger ones we've seen so far. She's gained much faster than any normal person and eaten more." Caline said. "Its mutation is different with most carriers but if we can find a trigger for it, we might be able to deduce how to cure it."

"Well...okay. But...don't do anything too painful." Elizabeth said as they forced her out of the room.

Elizabeth was pacing around in her temp room as she sighed. She then stopped when the room shook. She quickly ran back to the lab where she saw Chloe had once again gotten fatter. "Oh my god!"

"Ugh..." Caline groaned as Elizabeth helped her up.

"What the heck happened?" Elizabeth asked.

"We hadn't even touched her yet. She started crying when the syringe got close and then she started growing again. Though...I think we have found the trigger. Its emotion." Caline said.

"Emotions?" Elizabeth asked.

"Emotions can have unpredictable effects on ones body, its even likely they are what influence the virus's mutation." Caline said. "For example..."
11112232123222311.title: A Big Ray of Hope

111122321232223111.content:
"Look at Chloe right now. She started to freak out when we brought the syringe close, and that's when she began to grow." Caline explained. "That likely means Chloe's growth is triggered by sadness."

Elizabeth thought for a moment. "That does make some sense." She said. "When the virus mutated in her, she was sobbing, believing that we were freaks. She was completely distraught. So, it would make logical sense that she would grow when feeling sad. But what about me and Jenny? Why did we grow?"

"What were you two doing when your infections mutated?" Caline asked.

"I was comforting Chloe, and Jenny was worried for her." Elizabeth replied.

"So you likely grow when expressing kindness, and Jenny probably grows when feeling fear." Caline explained. "Now that we know what can trigger the growth, we can work on isolating a cure."

Elizabeth looked back at Chloe, who truly had calmed down now. "In the month I got to know her, she was rather depressed when she wasn't eating. Perhaps the virus being affected by emotion has something to do with whatever emotion we felt most." She theorized.

"Isn't that what I just said?" Caline asked, confused.

"No, hear me out." Elizabeth said. "There is a whole myriad of emotions that the virus could be affected by. Sure, Chloe was sad, but there were just as many times that she put on a smile, or showed anger. So why would the virus only grow through sadness? Perhaps the virus eventually attaches itself to a certain type of brain chemisty connected to whatever emotion has been felt most by that person."

"That... makes sense. Why didn't we think of that?" Caline said. "We need to run tests immediately."

"Please don't try to upset Chloe any further." Elizabeth said.

"We'll try our best." Caline replied. "This could take time though."

"How long?" Elizabeth asked.

Caline sighed. "By my estimate..."
111122321232223111.title: Sad Trigger

choices: As night arrives, Chloe changes during the night
1111223212322231113.content:
"A year?!" Elizabeth said in shock.

"Yes. Emotions are rather complex and they do tend to change from person to person. We'll need to map out everyone's emotional complex if we want to create a cure that goes along with everyone." Caline said.

"Well...okay." Elizabeth said feeling a little unease considering how much Chloe's been through. "Will...she be okay?"

"Well I have no doubts she'll do a lot of growing and might outgrow the facility but when that happens, we'll transport her to a much larger facility. That's pretty much all we can do for someone of her size." Caline said.

"I understand." Elizabeth said as she was escorted out of the room and back to her quarters as a lunch was delivered to her. "Poor Chloe. This is why I didn't want us getting caught." she said to herself with her mouth full. "I don't like the CDC because they just treat us like lab rats." she groaned before letting out a loud burp. "Oh...scuse me." she said. "Well...maybe it won't be so bad staying here." she said to herself as she went to her bed.
1111223212322231113.title: A Fattening Year

choices: Perhaps a group is more fitting
112.content:
It's been only 4 months since this weird virus has reared it's ugly head, the first few weeks, clothes for those infected were becoming tight, by the first month, pants ripping became a normal occurrence, halfway through the second month, the infected grew hungrier, consumed by a need to eat, by the end of said month, they grew enamored with their weight, during the 3rd month, they started losing concern towards exercising and manners.

It is the 4th month now and any chance of life returning to normal is gone, the infected are now trying to infect anybody that is healthy (although they aren't trying that hard), their hunger is through the roof and their weight is now causing property damage in some places.

You watched the news in your apartment, or at least you were trying to, amidst the sounds of loud burps, growling stomachs and people stuffing their faces, you tried to listen on your phone for any news on the matter, but every time, the news lady only grew worse, she still tried to provide the news, but the virus' grip on her grew stronger over time, just days ago, she had to eat on set just to keep her stomach silent, in front of you, however, was a rather heavy set woman, large stomach incessantly roaring, her suit looked extremely tight on her, while the chest area was less tight than the rest, the skirt she wore almost looked painted on, as her pear shaped body filled the clothes.

"Today, the infection is only growing worse as more and more people are infected" the newscaster said as her hand started rubbing her belly, "the center for disease control and prevention is still advising everyone to avoid large gatherings and that the chance of quarantines are increasing by the...", the newscaster slowly stopped, her mind wandering as she looked at her belly, now being rubbed by both hands, she stared at the hypnotic motions until she "continued", "As you can see, this virus may not be so bad", she claimed as she turned around, showcasing her body until her huge butt was in full view. "With a fat butt like this," she said as her hand lightly tapped her rear, sending a small shock wave to it, "you will never find a chair uncomfortable", the thing kept going, it was almost as if no one was there to stop it, so she continued her little "show", you closed your phone, you've seen enough to know that she was beyond saving now.

You head to your kitchen and made a list of what is missing, given the nature of the virus, you've had to stockpile food in order to avoid going out as often as possible, but due to how low your supplies were, you knew it was only a matter of time until you had to go out and get supplies.

The question is, in these times, are you guy, a gal or either that is part of a group of survivors...
112.title: An actual obesity epidemic

choices: You find some extra supplies, but a sleeping infected isn't far
An infected surprised you and proceeds to kiss you
1122.content:
You figured that the list might be too big for you to simply carry, but you should be able to get enough to last an extra week, if unlucky.

Stepping out of your apartment, you noticed that the hallways were in complete disarray, walls were cracked, some food wrappers scattered around, but you knew the janitorial crew made sure to keep it clean as much as possible. Taking the stairs, knowing barely anyone would take them, you silently made your way out and left to the grocery store,

The streets were bad, you could see that the infection had hit a large amount of the city's population, you could see people shambling their way to any source of food, some who got so big they barely could get up, you even saw a woman sleeping on the ground, her pants ripped on the sides and a shirt so tight that it rode up, showcasing her large belly for everyone to see.

As the walk continued on however, you began to worry that the grocery store may be overrun by the infected and with some of them trying to infect others, it is a worrying though, the news did disclose that infection is usually brought by contact from body fluids, mainly blood, sweat and saliva, or contaminated food samples. Regardless of the situation, you still walked at a brisk pace so as to conserve your energy.

As soon as you arrive at the grocery store, your suspicions were confirmed, there was a lot of infected making their way there as well, you rushed to the entrance and proceeded to go further in so as to avoid contact with them, you took as much as you could fit in your bag and tried to find an escape, given the chaotic situation in town, business isn't really existent anymore, in order to avoid painting a large target on you, you proceed to go through the back room and try to find an exit or possibly another surprise.
1122.title: A still healthy woman in these times

12.content: Now before you continue...which strain? The Growth or the Shrink?
12.title: Size Disorder

choices: A scientist trying to cure the disease.
A normal citizen trying to avoid infection.
An infected citizen trying to infect others.
122.content: Ah. So we're going with Size Disorder G. Do remember, those afflicted with Size Disorder G have their emotions heightened, so proceed with caution. Now, who are we?
122.title: Size Disorder G (Growth)

choices: She had grown a couple of feet
She was now ten feet tall
1221.content:
Dr. Valac Verum. A doctor who was studying growth genes as well as size disorders, genetic mutations that cause abnormal growth patterns within a person or unexpected shrinkage. For his first attempt, he had tested a new gene therapy machine on a Miss Helen Verum...his daughter. After losing his wife last year, the two had been living alone out in the country ever since then. However, one night, he attempts the unthinkable.

In the center, though, was a woman about Fiona's age. She was completely mutated, now a 12 foot ball filled with juice, which also trickled out of her mouth.

"Well well, we got another infected with us." The mammoth ball of a woman said. "But she's barely even begun to bloat."

"Look, I'm sorry to intrude." Fiona said. "I'm just hear looking for some medicine. Just give me some Blue Away, and I'll be on my way."

"Blue Away?" The huge woman asked. "Why would you want that? You're telling me you don't want to be a big, sexy ball like me?"

"In all honesty, no." Fiona replied. "And I have a daughter. I don't want to risk infecting her, so I'd really like to get some Blue Away."
The massive woman looked at Fiona for a second. She seemed to be thinking about something, but what, Fiona couldn't begin to guess.

Then the woman started laughing. Juice sprayed out of her mouth. Then, after she finished laughing, she said to Fiona...
15123122312.title: Infected's Own Little World

choices: ...Jess was infected, but only in the early stages.
151231223121.content:
"Why didn't you just say that sooner?" The woman asked. "Sure, you can have Blue Away! Max, get some Blue Away from the pharmacy!"

One of the infected nodded and walked off. Fiona was a big confused.

"What made you decide that?" Fiona asked.

"I'm a mother too." The infected woman said. "My name is Clair, and my daughter is Jess. Jess is 25, going to college to be an engineer... or was. She has her own apartment near here. I haven't heard from her since the outbreak began. I'd check on her, but I'm... not exactly built to go there."

Max returned with one box of Blue Away and handed it to Fiona. She thanked him kindly.

"That's it?" Clair asked. "I thought we had more?"

"Remember that raid last week?" Max said. "Took all our Blue Away except this one."

"Well, it's yours now Fiona." Clair said. "Um... when you leave, can you check on my daughter? Make sure she's alright? She lives in apartment 3B in the apartment building on Markin Street."

"I will." Fiona replied. "And thanks."
-------
Fiona left the supermarket happy. She had some more Blue Away, which meant the infection wouldn't spread for at least another day. She decided to honor Clair's request, and started for Markin Street.

She found it easily enough. The apartment building was the biggest building on the street. She noticed the door had been kicked in.

"Looters, I'd guess." Fiona said to herself. She entered the building, and ascended the stairs. Arriving on the third floor, she found apartment 3B. She knocked on the door.

"Hello?" A voice replied from the other side.

"Are you Jess? Your mom sent me to check on you!" Fiona replied.

"...the door's unlocked. Come in quick!" Jess replied.

Fiona opened the door and entered the apartment. In the living room, she immediately found Jess, and discovered...
151231223121.title: "Why didn't you just say that sooner? S...

choices: These guys dressed in blue raided the building
When a package arrived at my door.
When this guy forced something down my throat.
1512312231213.content:
"Uh...hi." said a large blue girl standing there with her shirt riding over her large blue berry as her jeans were begging for mercy as they strained against her body.

"What the heck? You're infected?" Fiona asked.

"Yeah but not to the point of producing juice...least not yet. I've been waiting for someone to come for days." Jess said. "I was able to get injected with some of the counter for the virus. But...I'm too big to make it out the door without help." she blushed.

Fiona sighed. "Not like touching her will infect me. Okay, you go to the door and I'll push you out." Fiona said as Jess waddled towards the door as Fiona pushed against the large blue woman. "One two three!" she said rushing into her as she pushed through faster. "One more and..." she said charging into her as Jess stumbled out of the doorway and lumbered in the halls before getting her footing. "You okay?"

"I'm big, blue and filled with juice. Otherwise, I'm feeling a-okay." Jess said resting a hand on her belly.

"How did you get infected?" Fiona asked.

"It started when..."
1512312231213.title: Big Blue Jess

15123122312131.content:
"A while ago, the building got raided by some looters. They went from apartment to apartment, stealing anything. When they got to mine, I managed to fight back, and they ran. One of them was infected, though. Wasn't too bloated, but she managed to spit some juice in my face." Jess explained. "After that, I was infected. Mom managed to send some Blue Away from the market before she got too big to leave, but I just used up my last one."

Fiona looked down at the Blue Away in her hand. "Do you want this one? It's the only one I have." She said.

"No. At least, not now. I injected myself just before you showed up." Jess said. "'sides, you might need it soon. Don't know how long ago you got infected."

"About a few hours, so I still have some time." Fiona replied. "But I guess you are right. I have a daughter, so I can't risk infected her. She's at the safe house."

"Lucky her." Jess said. "You mind if we leave? I'm kind of hungry."

Fiona nodded, and the two of them started down the stairs, Jess going slowly.
--------
A little while later, Fiona and Jess were leaving the supermarket. Fiona had brought Jess there to see her mom, and get food. Clair tried to convince Jess to stay, but Jess declined, saying she needed to find more Blue Away.

As the two walked the streets, Jess was staring at her bloated stomach.

"You think they'll ever find a permanent cure for this?" Jess asked.

"I hope so." Fiona replied. Just as she said that, though...
15123122312131.title: Food Run

choices: A nurse in a hospital filled with these infected
An infected who has somehow retained their mental state
a family member dealing with an infected relative
152.content: Ah, Toonmonia. It is from this disease that those infected change both physically and mentally into a living cartoon. How a person changes depends on personality. They could become some classic animal toon like Mickey Mouse or Bugs Bunny. They could just become a brightly colored and cartoonish version of themselves or even some sort of anime toon. Possibilities are endless with this virus. But...who will we follow?
152.title: Toonmonia

choices: "At least she's not suffering." Sandra said sadly.
Giggling, Greta rose in a flash, and passionately kissed Sandra.
1521.content:
The nurse fled with a shriek from the private patients' room. In floods of tears, she raced past the nurses station, and headed into an empty room. Doctor Sanderson followed, as a nurse headed the opposite direction towards the abandoned patient's room.

Opening the door, Doctor Sanderson was greeted with a wail, "I'm... I'm infected..."

Nurse Gibbs ripped open her uniform revealing her body to Doctor Sandra Sanderson.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/1a/3c/e3/...

She tried to comfort the distraught nurse, looking with a detached but professional air, at nurse Gibbs. A twinge of jealousy was quickly buried, Greta Gibbs was blessed with a full, firm bust.

"I'm bigger..." she sobbed, drawing deep gulps of air into her lungs it was hard for the doctor to be sure.

"I'm bigger... it's the first sign." she said, on a second attempt. The doctor knew the first sign of cartoonification was exaggeration, and Gibbs was already blessed. But neither woman could miss, as Greta's torso flexed, and surged forward.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/b5/02/2b/...

Heading from the generous, but still human dimensions, into a more cartoonish sphere.

Doctor Sanderson was struggling to find something to tell the infected nurse. Given the ward they were both on, the diagnosis didn't need a doctor.

Greta flickered briefly into her cartoon form, before flashing back.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/c9/a1/0b/...

It was painfully clear that she'd been severely infected. As moments later, another surge of growth startled them both.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/08/ee/c9/...

Sandra felt pity for the doomed nurse, cursed with breasts as big as her head, her toon fate was certain.

She flickered once more, this time only her eyes remained human, silently pleading for some miracle cure.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/b2/b3/44/...

They vanished in a blink, from one moment to the next her eyes were replaced with anime eyes. Wide, expressive, and far too large, her lips were a cartoon cupid bow, and she giggled. The world had gained another 'sexy cartoon nurse'.
1521.title: A nurse in a hospital filled with the infected.

1523.content:
Julie Winters was still trying to process everything that was happening. It had only been a week since she returned, but it still seemed impossible. And yet, the proof was in her house right now. The proof being her very own daughter.

Cleo Winters, her 22 year old daughter, had been in college. She was going to major in business, and dreamed of opening her own comic book shop. She'd been gone for about 4 years, studying, and Julie had been so proud of her.

Then, last week, she recieved a letter from the university Cleo was going to. Cleo had contracted the strange disease that was going around, and was being sent home for a while out of fear that she might infect the other students. That would have been fine with Julie, a chance to spend some time with her daughter again. Except this wasn't any old disease. This was Toonmonia.

It was a fairly new disease. Starting with sneezing, the infected would transform into a cartoon version of themselves, the type base on personality.

So now, Julie was dealing wtih a cartoon version of her daughter, simply trying to do her best to help, despite not understanding this disease.

She slowly entered her daughters room. Inside, her daughter was laying on her bed, reading one of her many comics. The infection had transformed her daugther into a...
1523.title: a family member dealing with an infected relative

choices: She went to notify the CDC
She decided to track her down herself
She found some changes in the living room, Cleo's still in the house
15232.content:
In the bed was a brightly colored young girl who appeared to be more of a teenager than a full grown woman as she kicked her legs up and down. She wore a polka dot skirt along with a plain white shirt with her hair done in a ponytail as she seemed a bit too upbeat. Almost silly in some instance.

She looked up from the book before tossing it aside. "God, that was boring. Mama! Dear dear mama. Please tell me you're going to let me out." Cleo said with a sense of glee in her voice.

"No way. I've been asked by the CDC to not let you out of this room under any circumstances. Why do you think I bolted your window shut?" her mother said.

"But mama...its so boring." Cleo groaned.

"I'm sorry but rules are rules." her mother said. "Now is there anything I can get you?"

"Maybe a magazine? Something more than these boring old comics." Cleo said.

"Sigh. All right." she said shutting the door. As she went to grab a magazine, she felt that something was off. She headed back to her daughters room. She knocked on the door for awhile but no answer came. She opened it to see a black hole on the wall. "Damn it!" she said slamming the door.
15232.title: Toony Cleo

152321.content:
Instantly, Julie raced for the nearest phone, and dialed the number the CDC had left her. It took only a second for someone to answer.

"Center for Disease Control." The voice answered. It sounded female.

"It's Julie Winters. My daughter, Cleo, was infected with Toonmonia. I was told to keep her locked in her room, but she's escaped." Julie explained.

"Ok, Ms. Winters. Please explain how your daughter managed to escape." The voice said.

"There's a large, black hole in her wall. Kind of like those portable holes you'd see in Looney Tunes." Julie said.

"Then that means she could be anywhere, but she probably hasn't left your town or city yet." The voice explained. "I need you to inform your local law inforcement to keep an eye out for your daughter. We'll send someone to deal with your daughter once she's been found."

"Thank you." Julie replied, before the line cut off. Sighing, she dialed the number for the towns police station. After a second, someone picked up. The person who answered was...
152321.title: Notification

choices: Her mother hurried to the car to try and find her
Before she could leave, a few tooned officers stood at the door
As she ran out, she saw the town becoming more...cartoonish
1523213.content:
"Hey there, mama. Calling the police? Oh that is a go to move." a familiar voice said on the other end.

"Cleo? What do you think you're doing?" her mother asked.

"Well, I figured you might try and call the po po first to try and apprehend me, so I decided to go right ahead and take them out of the running." Cleo said with a giggle.

"No I mean, why did you leave your room?" she demanded.

"Oh that. Like I said, I was getting bored. See, toons like me, we're meant to be funny, silly, and do things no normal human could ever do." Cleo said as she filed her nails. "I hate my old boring life and I don't ever wanna go back to being a boring old girl."

"Cleo Winters, I demand you stop this madness right now and come home." her mother said.

"Oh don't worry, mama. I always planned to save you for last. But before I can do that, I'll need to handle a few obstacles getting in my way and with my knowledge of toons, anime, etc...I'm pretty much a toon superstar." Cleo giggled. "See ya, mama." she said as she hung up.
1523213.title: Smarter than the average girl

choices: "...um... p-please stop!" (she'd become a nervous anime woman).
"Wait! I want to help you!" (Her mind hadn't been changed).
15232132.content:
Julie pretty much bolted out of the house as soon as the phone hung up. Well, she tried to at least. As soon as she opened the door, a few police officers were standing right outside the door. And Cleo hadn't been lying when she said she had "taken them out of the running."

There were seven officers in total. Three of them looked like they walked right out of a 30's cartoon. Two of them resembled officers from some superhero cartoon. And the last two had become buxom anime women.

"Miss Julie Winters. We have been asked by your daughter Cleo to insure that you do not leave the premise." One of the "hero cartoon" officers said.

"You're not going to stop me from getting to my daughter!" Julie yelled, before turning and racing for the back door. As she turned, she had seen one of the "30's cartoon" officers pull out an old walkie talkie.

Reaching the back door, she left her house, and tried to hop her own fence. She saw a group of 30's cartoon police cars race down the street.

"Wait, cartoon cars? I thought Toonmonia only affected people." Julie noted, before putting the thought aside to keep running.

As she turned a corner, she ran right into one of the officers who had turned into an anime woman. She turned to run back before the officer spoke. The officer said:
15232132.title: Toony Cops

152321321.content:
"Um...could you please...stop and let me arrest you?" she asked nervously as she was seen shaking as she tried to aim her gun.

"Well...time to put those self defense classes to use." Julie said before she swept the anime woman's legs before dragging her into the nearby police car, locking her in the back while taking her keys and starting the car as they drove off. "How the hell can cars become cartoons?"

"Um...it was Miss Cleo mam. She...um...made this strange paint that can turn anything coated with it into a toon. Its called toon paint." the nervous woman said.

"Wow. Right on the nose. If this keeps up the whole world isn't going to stand a chance. I need to get to the station to..." Julie said.

'Uh...then you'll be even farther away from her." the woman said. "She...might have already left town."

"What? Left town?" Julie asked.

"She didn't want to spend too much time here, so she took a car from our impound lot and drove off out of town." the woman said.

"Well where is she going?" Julie demanded.

"Uh...she said something about..."
152321321.title: Shy Copper

1523213211.content:
"She... um... she said something about a crop duster." The cop said. "I... uh... think she wants to use to to... spead the Toonmonia."

"A crop duster? The closest place that would have one of those is on the state line." Julie said. "It'd take her a while to get there, so I might have time to catch up to her."

"Uh... y-you know I can't allow that." The cop said. "I'm supposed to take you in. S-so... could you please surrender?"

Julie took a look at the anime woman next to her. She looked like she was in her mid-twenties, with silver hair and blue eyes. Her cop uniform seemed to barely hold back her incredibly large bosom. The badge on her uniform read "Turner". She looked like she was about to cry.

Julie felt bad for the cop. The Toonmonia seemed to affect her badly.

"Officer Turner, you're not yourself." Julie said. "Look, I'm finding my daughter, and when I do, I promise I'll turn you back to normal. But you need to help me find her, ok?"

Officer Turner looked at Julie, and nodded.

"O...ok." Turner stammered. "I... I didn't want to take you in anyway. I just started this week, I just... I just want to do a good job, then..."

"It's OK." Julie said. "I'll cure you. Now, which direction did my daughter go?"

"...north." Turner replied.

Julie started to drive north, but was stopped by...
1523213211.title: A Crop Duster to Catch

choices: One of the flattened toons hanging onto the trunk
a giant robot marching after them
the mob getting its second wind chasing after them
15232132111.content:
Before them stood a large army of men, women and children, all of them tooned in some way as they created a large human shield that blocked the only way out. "She works fast." she said.

"You really can't beat a toon." Turner said. "We're...pretty resilient."

"Yeah. I remember from those..." Julie said as she got an idea. "So if these people were to get flattened by a speeding car, they would be fine right?"

"Yeah. We may look like people, but we're cartoons now. We can't be hurt." Turner said before noticing the car backing up. "Oh boy."

'Hang on tight!" Julie said putting it into drive as she plowed right through the blockade, flattening a number of the citizens standing in their way as they headed right out of town. She looked back in the rearview just to be sure as she saw the unflattened citizens pumping up the flattened ones with bike pumps. "Wow..."

"Yeah...Toon physics are pretty incredible. You could blow up the town and everyone tooned would still sur-" Turner said as the car shook a little. "What was that?"

Julie looked in the mirror and saw...
15232132111.title: Army of the Tooned

152321321111.content:
Hanging off of the trunk was one of the toon citizens, completely flat. It was a man who looked like he stepped out of a Looney Tunes short. He tried to climb up to the front of the car, but was having trouble due to the wind constantly blowing him around.

"Uh... we have a problem." Turner said.

"I see him." Julie replied. "And I think this'll get him off." She then pulled a sharp right turn. The cartoon man was flung off of the car, floating gently to the road like a piece of paper. As the car drove off, Turner looked in the mirror and saw some other cartoons run up with a bike pump.

The car left the town limits, and it looked like none of the other toons were following them. Julie sighed in relief.

"I think we're good for now." Julie replied. "Sorry about that."

"D-don't worry." Turner stammered. "I'm just still getting used to all this." Turner then sighed. "So, you said the only place that had a crop duster was the state line. Why?"

"History museum." Julie replied. "When Cleo was little, I'd take her there sometimes to check out their entertainment exhibit. She wanted to run a comic book shop. Loved old comics."

"I-I see." Turner replied. "...Turner's just my last name. My first name's Samantha."

"Nice to meet you, Samantha." Julie replied.
------
Just a mile outside of town, the police car was running low on gas. Julie pulled into a gas station to fuel up and get some snacks for the road. As she was in the store, she looked out the window and saw...
152321321111.title: Toon Physics are Fun

choices: A hazmat was there and coated her in paint
She is able to escape unharmed
A hazmat is there but she avoids the paint
1523213211111.content:
"Good. There's the CDC. They must have reacted to my...oh no." she said seeing the truck all cartooned with tooned hazmat people heading out of the truck. "They must have already tried to apprehend her and failed." she said as they approached the store. "Uh oh."

She ducked behind an aisle as she peaked out to see the hazmat toons aiming some strange device at the building as a paint like substance started to coat the building. "Patrons remain calm. You are all infected with the boring human disease. We will rectify that in no time at all." the leader said.

"Damn it. They're coating the store in toon paint. This is not good. I need to get out of here." Julie muttered before seeing the back door. "Just got to make it out the back."

She got down onto the floor as she slowly crawled towards the door in the back. As she did, she saw the paint beginning to seep into the building, changing it and anything it touched. She hurried as best she could to the door as she turned the knob and opened it wide.
1523213211111.title: Center for Diseased Cartoons?

choices: ...a news report about a spreading infection.
15232132111112.content:
Thankfully, Julie got the door open and exited the gas station without the toonified CDC even noticing her. Quickly, she got back to the toon police car, and entered the driver's seat. She looked at the passenger seat, and saw Samantha curled into a ball (well, as best she could with her large chest), terrified.

"Cleo got them too?" Samantha asked nervously.

"Unfortunately." Julie replied. "We need to find her and fast."

With that, Julie started the car and floored it out of the gas station. In the rear-view mirror, she saw the infected CDC trying to start their truck, but failing.

"They aren't chasing us?" Julie asked. While relieved, she was also a bit confused.

"M-maybe the truck runs on toon logic now." Samantha replied. "It's n-not working because it's probably funnier that way."

"So anything infected runs on toon logic. That could help." Julie replied. "...wait, would that mean you work on anime logic now."

"...m-maybe." Samantha answered nervously.
-------
A while later, it started turning to night. Thankfully, there was a hotel just up the road. Julie pulled into it, hiding the toonified police car behind the building, and went to check in.

Once that was done, she and Samantha went to the hotel room. As Julie sat on the bed, Samantha entered the bathroom.

'This is not good.' Julie thought. 'If Cleo got the CDC, then there likely isn't much that can stop her. But if everything infected runs on toon logic, then she probably does to.'

"Uh... Julie?" Samantha asked, stepping out of the bathroom. Julie looked up, and saw Samantha was now wearing a purple nightgown.

"Wait, where'd you get that?" Julie asked, bewildered.

"I-I don't know." Samantha replied. "I took a shower, and when I stepped out, my uniform turned into this. M-maybe it's that anime logic."

Julie shrugged, and Samantha went to her bed. The two then nodded off.
------
The next morning, Julie was woken up by...
15232132111112.title: No Toonification

Samantha comes up with an idea

She yawned a bit as she got up and saw Samantha watching TV. "Hey, what's going on?" Julie asked still a bit sleepy.

"Look." Samantha said pointing to the TV as they saw a city looking completely tooned with a mix of normal, anime and action all across the city as people were either enjoying it or freaking out.

The two of them saw as the camera pointed to the sky to show a large blimp with Cleo's face on it pass over the city as it seemed to spread a large amount of a strange rainbow colored substance and changed anything it touched.

"Damn, that girl works fast." Julie said. "This is insane. My daughters become some sort of insane supervillain. She takes down the CDC, she has the cops under her thumb, pretty soon she'll have the entire world going all loony."

"I know. Its almost crazy." Samantha said.

"We need to get to her and stop this?" Julie said as she paced and thought. However very few ideas seemed to come to her.

"...um, I-I have an idea. Maybe." Samantha said.

"M-maybe we can get you on that blimp, and you can try to talk to your daughter, and get her to stop." Samantha explained. "I-I'm pretty... um, curvy now, and as an anime woman, I-I probably have that cute shy girl thing going on. I can distract the guards, and you can sneak on."

a strange timer that was counting down

She saw a hatch opened up as she flew right into it. "Odd...why didn't they send out any resistance?" she pondered.

Julie walked around the blimp as she noticed major parts of it. One part of the blimp was manufacturing the toon paint that was changing the environment, another was testing how far a person has changed both physically and mentally.

"This whole blimp is wacky. Just what is going on through my little girls head." Julie said before reaching the end of the corridor. She opened the door which lead to the cockpit but to her surprise the room was completely empty and devoid of any life. All that was inside was...

Julie can't get the door open but stops the blimp

152321321111122211.content:
She found just a single tape recorder on the dash as she picked it up and played it.

"Hello there, mama. I know you've been hunting after me. Trying to get me to come home. But I have to tell you...you can't win, mama." Cleo's voice said.

"What the heck does that mean?" Julie said.

If I timed this right, I should be locking the door right about...now." the voice said as the door shut as Cleo waved outside its window.

153.title: Clown Flu

1531.content:
"Any word from the CDC?" Dr. Evans asked.

"Not yet." Dr. White replied. "All but 6 of the counties are suffering outbreaks, so their stretched thin right now."

Dr. Aiden Evans and Dr. Lucy White, doctors working with the Billings Clinic, were referring to Clown Flu, a new disease that had sprung up in the last few months in Montana. Anyone infected with this new disease turned into a literal clown, with chalk-white skin, big noses and feet, bizarrly colored and styled hair, and a disrupted thought process that made them act silly all the time.

Despite it only being a few months, the disease had managed to spread rapidly, to the point that Montana had to be put under quarantine, and all but cut off from the rest of the United States. At the moment, the population was a near even split between uninfected and infected.

"Any more cases come up?" Aiden asked.

"Unfortunately, yes." Lucy replied. "Boulder's reporting a 10 percent increase in cases, and Deer Lodge County just reported it's first few cases."

"Damn it!" Aiden yelled. "We need to start working faster then! Did you bring the patient in? We need their blood sample."

"They're in the examination room." Lucy replied.

Aiden nodded, and went straight into the examination room. Inside was a young woman who was...
1531.title: Outbreak in Montana

1533.content:
"Ahyuck Ahyuck. Wow...this seems like a dreary and boring looking town...think it needs a little cheering up." said a short little clown with a round red nose and a rainbow afro as he wore overalls and a polkadot shirt. His skin was a chalk white and his lips a bright red curled into a permanent smile.

15533313112121122.title: High School

155333131121211222.content:
Just as she thought she was safe, she met resistance in the form of another human being. Resistance here meaning she quite literally ran into the other person, somehow not knocking them over.

"Oh my god! Sandra?! It's been WAY too long!" The other person yelled, in a voice Sandra still recognized after all these years.

Right in front of her was her old friend Nora Lancaster. In school, Nora had been the rebellious girl, dressing in punk clothing and dying the tips of her hair purple. Sandra had often assumed it was a phase and Nora would grow out of it. Seems that after all these years, Sandra assumed wrong. Nora hadn't grown out of the phase, she embraced it.

Nora's hair was a sight to behold, the right half being long, straight, and dyed dark green, while the left half was a buzz-cut dyed dark purple. She seemed to be wearing red contacts, had black lipstick on, and her face had several piercings on it. Unlike everyone else at the reunion, she wasn't wearing some form of dress or suit, instead opting for a black torn tank top with a coffin on it, shiny black shorts, and black heeled boots. All of it complimented her naturally curvy frame.

"Nora, you... wow." Sandra said. "You really doubled-down on the punk theme, didn't you?"

"Hell yeah I did!" Nora yelled. "Punk's in my blood! Started my own metal band and everything! We're small time right now, but pretty soon Blood Shriek's gonna be a big name!"

"I... see." Sandra said. She had to admit she was a bit jealous. Nora was more successful then she was.

"Though the band's in a rough spot right now." Nora said. "Our bassest Terri ended up getting that new disease, and her ass got massive. It's just like, one minute she's celebrating her big 2 8 birthday, and the next we're trying to get her hips unwedged from the chair."

That caught Sandra's attention. "Really?" She said. "Sorry to hear that." She ended up fidgeting with her skirt.

"Yup. Though she's not upset. Hell, when she's not onstage, she spends most of her day in her underwear." Nora said. "But enough about that, how've you been?"

Sandra felt a little better with Nora here, but the latter ended up dragging Sandra into the high-school gym. As the two talked, Sandra saw someone walked up to the two of them. Soon, standing in front of them was...
155333131121211222.title: Nora the Rebel

155333132.content:
Sandra sat towards the back of the class, not wanting to disturb anyone anymore than necessary. With her long strawberry hair, she settled into the first position. Looking around, she realised with a blush, that her new yoga outfit was briefer than she'd thought when she bought it. She'd chosen it for maximum flexibility, but now realised it was cut too high on the hip, and too narrow at the shoulders.

She smirked despite herself, glad the class was female only. As she looked like she was naked from the back. Settling into the first pose she tried to relax and enjoy the session.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/4c/bc/21/...

Listening to the instructor, she closed her eyes and focused on her breathing. The huffing and snorting from her neighbours made it sound like a competitive sport, she took in the neighbour on her right, with a sneaky, quick blink. She was dressed in a more covering red outfit. With a bare midriff.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/fd/5b/5e/...

Sandra went through the exercises with calm, and felt her heart slowing. As she returned to the first pose, she could feel the tension easing from her muscles.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/36/fd/22/...

Hell, even her mat felt more comfortable and padded. As she watched and copied the instructor at the front of the class, she felt herself embraced by tranquility. Resisting the urge to pluck that damned leotard from exploring the depths of her ass cleavage, Sandra focused on rising above it. As the class returned to the first position, she knew it was working. The world felt more controllable, and herself more comfortable with her body.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/7c/16/59/...

As her arms returned to her side, she dismissed the idea her hips were wider, her ass fuller, heavier as distractions from the material world, and an insecurity she needed to rise above.

The instructor was repeating the first set of moves, so Sandra closed her eyes. Blocking out the distractions of the mundane world, and repeating the moves as she recalled them from the first time. Everything felt right, as she breathed out, returning her hands and centre to the first position.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/ef/b7/e3/...

This time, she definitely bumped her arms against her hips. Cursing at her failure, the soft spoken swearing drew a hiss from her neighbour, a low urging for her to be quiet.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/5c/44/14/...

Followed immediately by, "Fuck sake..." As she rose to her feet, pointing at Sandra as if she were a freak.

The scales fell from Sandra's eyes, and she saw that she was now blessed/cursed with a truly equine sized ass.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/56/7a/16/...

Her pelvis cracked and spread as she rose, to her feet.
